name: Lusso Large Post Top
description: The Lusso Collection powered by ARRAY from Visionaire Lighting can elegantly compliment the daytime architecture of your space, while providing nighttime illumination that is up to task and equally as elegant. The collection consists of a wall sconce, bollard, single or twin arm post top and a beautiful pole mount. Available in two housings sizes and lumen packages up to 55K lumens thanks to our performance ARRAY LED platform. Scale and design creativity has no limits for any application.

description: The Lusso Collection powered by ARRAY from Visionaire Lighting can elegantly compliment the daytime architecture of your space, while providing nighttime illumination that is up to task and equally as elegant. name: Premier 2 L
description: Contemporary design meets the new generation of green LED technology in the Premier. The Premier LED fixture can provide a new contemporary style, reduced energy consumption and reduced maintenance outdated luminaries.

name: Premier 2 M
description: Contemporary design meets the new generation of LED green technology in this stunning lumenaire, the PRE-2-M. The PRE-2-M series provides up to fifty percent energy savings over traditional HID light sources and offers excellent beam control and LED life beyond 100,000 hours for 350 milliamp systems. The PRE-2-M is offered in six optical distributions.

name: Premier 2 M Serenity Lens
description: Contemporary design meets the new generation of LED green technology in this stunning lumenaire, the PRE-2-M Serenity Lens. The PRE-2-M Serenity Lens series provides up to fifty percent energy savings over traditional HID light sources and offers excellent beam control and LED life beyond 100,000 hours. The Serenity lens blocks the line of site from our LED source while still giving you the maximum amount of light for any application.

name: V-Arch Bollard
description: V-Bollard – part of our V-Collection is a high performance architectural LED luminaire to be used in outdoor lighting applications. Sleek design takes advantage of the low profile LED lamp technology. Superior thermal management allows for maximum LPW output.

name: Apex
description: The Apex(TM) integrates LED technology with a popular contemporary fixture design. Apex(TM) is a scalable LED luminaire with four different lumen packages. Designers can dial right in on the desired light level and wattage for any application. The high performance of the Apex allows for great light levels AND great aesthetics in one fixture package.

name: Oden Array
description: This architectural Oden Array has the optical flexibility for any lighting application. The Oden Array is offered with three different sizes, ten different specification grade optics, a lumen package ranging from 5,000 – 50,000 lumens, wattage ranging 32 watts to 406 watts plus six different cap and shade options, from  is Its stylistic versatility allows it to complement any design oriented project.

name: Oden
description: This sturdy architectural fixture has the optical flexibility for any lighting application. Its stylistic versatility allows it to complement any design oriented project.

name: Cross Bow Architectural
description: The unique BOW LED components have been pole/bollard mounted to create the latest architectural outdoor luminaire family from Visionaire Lighting. The Cross BOW Series take architectural outdoor applications toward a European style that is unique and meaningful.

name: California Aria Array
description: The California Aria is a strong die cast aluminum fixture made in 3 architecturally pleasing housing styles. Available in a multitude of optical and stylistic options, this fixture’s versatility makes it applicable to any design-oriented project.

description: The California Aria is a strong die cast aluminum fixture made in 3 architecturally pleasing housing styles. Available in a multitude of optical and stylistic options, this fixture’s versatility makes it applicable to any design-oriented project.

name: Pavilion II
description: The Pavilion II series is a versatile and contemporary fixture ideal for architectural applications where scale and style are essential.
